attributes.action: think long and hard about the social servies and all involved with Baby P, and whether they should be allowed to carry on working with children?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to show the Prime Minister that the whole nation is appalled with how the social services failed poor Baby P, resulting in his short, tragic life being taken.     What happened to that poor, innocent child is unexplainable. The social services and evryone involved with Baby P have failed that poor child..if they are allowed to carry on working with children similar to Baby P, this could be an ongoing viscous circle of tragic lives being selfishly taken.

So please show your support for Baby P, and stop this from happening in the future. Thank You.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
